name: Cowboy Love Story
description:
Kill all the radioactive monsters on the fabled alien arena to reunite with the love of your life!

Manual
After every fight you can either eat your enemy (gaining HP) or drink um... the magic liquid to decrease your radiation level.

Skill tree (from left to right)
Attack
Stun (1-2 turns)
Vomit (reduces radiation level, on highest level also hurts the monster)
Spit (decrease monster's accuracy)
Health Regeneration (a small to moderate ammount after each battle)
Armour (reduces small to moderate ammout of damage from physical attacks from monsters)
Metabolism (reduces small to moderate ammout of radiation after each battle)

Warning!
After 9th battle monsters get really strong!

Enjoy ;)

Code - Filip Kucharski
Art - Lidia Sosna
Design, Music - Steven Czerwinski
